name: Poustris
description:
Poustris is a tetris game I made for my friends because I was bored! It took me only 1 day to make it, it wasn't a hard experience. I just had to play with coding a little bit. 

Poustris is not my first game! I have a lot of games that I made but didn't share with yall! I am practicing for years now not for Poustris, but for Unity Development.

I have started working on a horror game project "SATANAS", my biggest project ever. It will take a couple of years to make it... I'll do my best! Follow me on itch.io or @BrawlerakiYT on Twitter for more

This game isn't the best game I ever made, it is just a practice game for everyone.

THIS GAME IS GREEK!

Just a reminder that this game contains Greek Words! A fact is that: On the right top corner when playing the game, is the QUIT BUTTON to exit the game without pressing ESC or ALT + F4! But, you choose how to quit!

ENJOY MY FIRST TETRIS FAN-MADE GAME!
